attr.title: R&Watch-Dobtopus
attr.desc: A tight boss rush that's a challenge without being too brutal. The graphics have a sleek minimalist style with loads of visual flairs. This is a mini-game recreated in the Game & Watch style and is a demake of R-Type. Try to hit the face in the middle of the screen while avoiding enemy attacks!
attr.inst: Download at https://nizakashii.itch.io/rwatch and place data.win into the gamedata folder
